ext_weather.name: Tonight
ext_weather.shortForecast: Showers And Thunderstorms then Chance Showers And Thunderstorms
ext_weather.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms before midnight, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms. Cloudy, with a low around 66. East wind 5 to 10 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. New rainfall amounts between a half and three quarters of an inch possible.
